page.title: 11Dentons farm visit 2
page.content: At the farm livestock was more evident from Larry the lamb (rejected by its mother ),Basil the fox,8.5 tousand chickens for fattening,40 sheep and 80 lambs,100+ pigs,geese,ducks,guinea fowl,and at christmas turkeys. Arable farming consists of wheat, barley, sugar beet and peas under contract to Wold farm foods (a local farming co-operative ).Other crops like potatoes and fruit orchards are for family use.The family labour force of 3 live in the farmhouse, 2 other workers 1 part-time live in the village.Decisions on farming policy are made by the family although sometimes the advice gien by company reps. is taken.This type of farm is typical of the area.It was difficult to know at one point where this farm ended and the neighbouring Beechwood began.Both sharing the ancient pond.
